类 DFAPoint

java.lang.Object
scanner.DFAPoint
public class DFAPoint extends Object
The point in scanner DFA.

      private boolean finish
      Is the finish state or not.

    • edges

      private HashMap<Character,Integer> edges
      The out edge from this state. It save with a hashmap, key is the charactor to go. Value is the target to go.

      Constructor with a type, it means it is a finish state.
